attributes.additional_details:
I would like to remove all dual language signs from all roads.There can be no person in the UK who gets any benefit from reading signs in ,for example Welsh. as well as English when looking for the way to Cardiff but the information overload can be of slight,but perhaps critical difficulty for English speaking monoglots.
   I have no opinion on any other aspect of use or non-use of Welsh,Gaelic etc.and confess that my main irritations  have been in France where signs in French/Breton in unfamiliar places have ben an extra problem.This has made me sympathetic to the problems of visitors from Europewho,driving on what is for them the wrong side of the road, do not need extra difficulties.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Welsh Government.
